paper_meta.Paper_title: Saliva "Treat-and-Heat" Triplex Reverse Transcription Loop-Mediated Isothermal Amplification Assay for SARS-CoV-2.

protocols.Paper_title: Molecular Characterization of Increased Amplicon Lengths in SARS-CoV-2 Reverse Transcription Loop-Mediated Isothermal Amplification Assays
Methods: other:LAMP/RT-LAMP amplification (WarmStart Colorimetric LAMP) with evaluation of additives (e.g., guanidine hydrochloride, DMSO, GC-Melt, PVSA) and subsequent amplicon purification for sequencing/analysis

protocols.Paper_title: Molecular Characterization of Increased Amplicon Lengths in SARS-CoV-2 Reverse Transcription Loop-Mediated Isothermal Amplification Assays
Methods: other:RT-LAMP assay development/optimization and sequencing-based characterization of RT-LAMP amplicons; no explicit sample-prep protocol described on provided pages (Figures 4–5 and References/Acknowledgments pages)
